item.title: Seriosly help me my 3rd day no one answered and its been done a lot
item.dc:creator: @Zanzibar Zanzibar
item.description:
@Zanzibar wrote:

[quote=“bmxr4c3r709, post:6, topic:116040”][code]I know why he’s not saying anything…
Change this:

if (npcs.npcType == 29) { if (misc.random2(15) == 1) { npcs.updateRequired = true; npcs.textUpdateRequired = true; npcs.textUpdate = "welcome"; } }

To this:
.updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Welcome."; } } ][/quote]
Fix Your Code Tags…

EDIT : Also, You Provided The Same Thing But A Capital W… What A Difference…
So Use This

if (npcs[i].npcType == 29) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 3) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Welcome!"; } }

Read full topic
item.source: Seriosly help me my 3rd day no one answered and its been done a lot

item.title: Seriosly help me my 3rd day no one answered and its been done a lot
item.dc:creator: @bmxr4c3r709 bmxr4c3r709
item.description:
@bmxr4c3r709 wrote:

I know why he’s not saying anything…
Change this:

if (npcs.npcType == 29) { if (misc.random2(15) == 1) { npcs.updateRequired = true; npcs.textUpdateRequired = true; npcs.textUpdate = "welcome"; } }

To this:

if (npcs.npcType == 29) { if (misc.random2(15) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Welcome."; } }

Read full topic

item.title: Seriosly help me my 3rd day no one answered and its been done a lot
item.dc:creator: @lol_range01 lol range01
item.description:
@lol_range01 wrote:

ive created a npc chuck id 29 and im trying to make him say welcome and i added this to NPCHandler.java

										if (npcs[i].npcType == 29) {
					if (misc.random2(15) == 1) {
						npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdate = "welcome";
					}
				}

and this to autospawn.cfg

spawn = 29 3254 3430 0 3254 3430 3254 3430 1 chuk - welcome

but in the game its just standing there not saying anything plz help me

Read full topic
item.source: Seriosly help me my 3rd day no one answered and its been done a lot
